snippet: HGGC, a middle-market private equity firm formerly known as Huntsman Gay Global Capital, has taken control of MyWebGrocer, a 14-year-old company that provides Web and digital marketing services for brick-and-mortar grocers like Kroger and Ralphs.
abstract: HGGC, a middle-market private equity firm formerly known as Huntsman Gay Global Capital, has taken control of MyWebGrocer, a 14-year-old company that provides Web and digital marketing services for brick-and-mortar grocers like Kroger and Ralphs.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED
